assessment.description: No load test scripts or benchmark suites found in CI.

existing_benchmarks.description: Go benchmark functions may exist in _test.go files (func BenchmarkXxx)
existing_benchmarks.status: Not verified in CI — no benchmark job in helm_core_gates.yml

recommended_load_scenarios: Sustained 1000 RPS through proxy → measure receipt throughput
ProofGraph with 100K nodes → verify traversal performance
SwarmPDP batch evaluation with 10K requests → measure parallelism
Evidence export with 10K receipts → verify determinism under load

rationale: Performance characteristics under load are undocumented. No SLA targets defined.
